tree.name: Ryan Rollins
tree.tradeDescription: Hawks traded Rollins (pick #44) to Bucks on draft night
tree.note: Selected 44th overall in 2022 NBA Draft out of Toledo. Re-signed with MIL in July 2025.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: MIL's own 2024 second-round pick sent to Atlanta. Subsequently traded by Atlanta.
